snippet: Europe's biggest construction and concessions company, Vinci, warned it expects a slowdown in the second half of 2014, especially outside Europe, and a slight decrease in its revenue for the year on a like-for-like basis....

headline.print_headline: Vinci Sees Second-Half Slowdown, Pays Special Dividend
headline.main: Vinci Sees Second-Half Slowdown, Pays Special Dividend

lead_paragraph: Europe's biggest construction and concessions company, Vinci, warned it expects a slowdown in the second half of 2014, especially outside Europe, and a slight decrease in its revenue for the year on a like-for-like basis.
